en: Bow down thine ear, O Jehovah, and answer me; For I am poor and needy.
hmr: Aw LALPA keia tieng hin i na hung sit la, mi hung dawn rawh, Rimsi le pasetak ka ni hi.

en: Preserve my soul; for I am godly: O thou my God, save thy servant that trusteth in thee.
hmr: Ka hringna hi vawngṭha la, Pathien ngaisak mi ka ni sih a, Aw, nang ka Pathien, nangma ringtu i siehlaw hi, sandam rawh.

en: Be merciful unto me, O Lord; For unto thee do I cry all the day long.
hmr: Aw LALPA, mi lunginsiet la, Sûnnithlâkin ka ko hlak si cheh a,

en: Rejoice the soul of thy servant; For unto thee, O Lord, do I lift up my soul.
hmr: I siehlaw hringna hi sukhlim la, Aw LALPA, ka lungril hi i kuomah ka sie tlat hlak sih a.

en: For thou, Lord, art good, and ready to forgive, And abundant in lovingkindness unto all them that call upon thee.
hmr: LALPA, nang chu i ṭhah a, ngaidam i pei a, A kotuhai che phawt kuomah zainêmna i hau sih a.

en: Give ear, O Jehovah, unto my prayer; And hearken unto the voice of my supplications.
hmr: Aw LALPA, ka ṭawngṭainaa hin na lo sit la, Lunginsiet ka hnina râwl hi lo ngai rawh.

en: In the day of my trouble I will call upon thee; For thou wilt answer me.
hmr: Ka lunginzîng ni chun ko ka ti cheh a, Nangin i mi dawn ding a ni sih a.

en: There is none like unto thee among the gods, O Lord; Neither are there any works like unto thy works.
hmr: Aw LALPA, pathienhai lai chun nang ang hrim hrim an um nawh a, I thilthawhai ang hi thilthaw hrim hrim a um bawk nawh.

en: All nations whom thou hast made shall come and worship before thee, O Lord; And they shall glorify thy name.
hmr: Aw LALPA, i siem hnam tinrênghai chu hung an ta, i hmaah hung kûn an ta, I hming chu hung chawimawi an tih.

en: For thou art great, and doest wondrous things: Thou art God alone.
hmr: Nang chu i ropui a, thilmakhai i thaw bawk hlak sih a, Nangma chau hi Pathien i nih.

en: Teach me thy way, O Jehovah; I will walk in thy truth: Unite my heart to fear thy name.
hmr: Aw LALPA, i lampui chu mîn chûktir la, i thutaka chun um ka tih, I hming ṭi dingin lungril sakhat mîn puttir rawh.

en: I will praise thee, O Lord my God, with my whole heart; And I will glorify thy name for evermore.
hmr: Aw LALPA ka Pathien, ka lungril po poin inpâk ka ti cheh a, I hming hi kumkhuoin chawimawi ka tih.

en: For great is thy lovingkindness toward me; And thou hast delivered my soul from the lowest Sheol.
hmr: Ka chunga i ngilneina chu a nasain; Ka hringna hi khursûng hnuoihnungtaka inthawkin i sanhim sih a.

en: O God, the proud are risen up against me, And a company of violent men have sought after my soul, And have not set thee before them.
hmr: Aw Pathien, mi chapohai chun an mi thawh a, Mi nunse um khâwmhai chun ka hringna hi sukbo tumin an zawng a, Nang chu an hmaah an sie ngai naw che.

en: But thou, O Lord, art a God merciful and gracious, Slow to anger, and abundant in lovingkindness and truth.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, aw LALPA, nang chu Pathien, lainatnaa sip, mi lunginsietthei, Lunginuoi, zainêm le thutak hau i nih.

en: Oh turn unto me, and have mercy upon me; Give thy strength unto thy servant, And save the son of thy handmaid.
hmr: Aw keia tieng hung ngha la, mi lunginsiet rawh. I siehlaw kuoma hin i hrâtna pe la, I suoknu nau hi sandam rawh.

en: Show me a token for good, That they who hate me may see it, and be put to shame, Because thou, Jehovah, hast helped me, and comforted me.
hmr: Ṭhatna ding inchikna mîn entir la, A mi theidatuhai chun chu chu an hmuh a an muolphona dingin; LALPA nangin i mi ṭhangpuia i mi thlamuon leiin.
